item.title: Video Editor for my podcast - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Video Editor for Strategic Moves Podcast
Are you a creative video editor with a passion for storytelling? Join our team at Strategic Moves Podcast! We produce engaging, hour-long episodes featuring insightful conversations with diverse guests. Airing four times a month, our podcast explores the intersections of art, culture, politics, and business.

Responsibilities:

Edit 45-minute to 1-hour podcast episodes for YouTube and other platforms.
Enhance audio quality and incorporate visuals, graphics, and music.
Ensure timely delivery of episodes to maintain our monthly schedule.
Qualifications:

Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Strong sense of pacing, storytelling, and visual aesthetics.
Experience in audio enhancement and synchronization.
Join us and contribute to meaningful conversations that inspire and inform our audience!

Check out our channel: Strategic Moves Podcast on YouTube

Hourly Range: $36.00-$60.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Corporate Video, Spokesperson Video, YouTube Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Podcast
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Corporate Video, Spokesperson Video, YouTube Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Podcast
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Monetization Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced YouTube Video Monetization Specialist to help us optimize our YouTube channel for monetization and grow our revenue. As a specialist, you will be responsible for implementing monetization strategies, managing YouTube Partner Program requirements, and maximizing ad revenue. You should have a deep understanding of YouTube's policies, guidelines, and best practices to ensure compliance and long-term success. The ideal candidate must have a proven track record of successfully monetizing YouTube channels and increasing ad revenue. If you are passionate about YouTube and have the expertise to help us monetize our videos effectively, we would love to hear from you.

Skills needed:
- YouTube channel management
- YouTube Partner Program
- Monetization strategies
- Ad revenue optimization
- Compliance with YouTube policies
- Data analysis

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 16:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube, YouTube Development, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube, YouTube Development, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube and LinkedIn videos - Upwork
item.description:
We want to do a business channel, for our business on YouTube and LinkedIn. Subject matter will be videos showcasing technology, presentations, demos and tutorials. "Colour" is a major feature of our expertise. We will provide content, shot in a reasonable studio setup with Canon Eos R50 and decent lighting as well as stills. We require a catchy brief intro video to start with, then raw video footage edited and composed as well as a catchy thumbnail for each video. Videos and thumbnails must be edited to suit both LinkedIn and YouTube requirements respectively.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00

We need content creators to record content creatively and strategically of our products so we can use those videos for our TikTok and Instagram Posts.

item.title: TikTok Sports Edit Video Creator (5 videos needed) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual who can create viral sports edit videos for our TikTok channel. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail and a strong understanding of sports. You will be responsible for sourcing and editing exciting sports footage, adding special effects, transitions, and music to create dynamic and engaging videos. The videos should have a unique and innovative style that captures the attention of our target audience. If you have experience in video editing, an understanding of TikTok trends, and a passion for sports, we would love to hear from you!

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Knowledge of TikTok trends
- Strong understanding of sports
- Attention to detail
- Creativity
- Time management

Examples:
Here is a Tiktok playlist of a few examples of the video style we're referring to:
https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZTN6AMkFU/

IMPORTANT:
Please make sure you provide examples of Tiktok videos/edits you've done to demonstrate you're capable of producing the video content we're envisioning.

Budget: $250

Category: Video Editing

Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Education, Music Video

item.title: Youtube Explainer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, Please read full Job Post

We have an exciting opportunity for someone to Join our team to create videos about a wide range of topics. These topics spread from many keyword phrases like: 'How to, 'Tutorials' 'Which is Better' 'This Explained,' and many more. Focusing on worldwide trends and lots of interesting topics. You will be require to research the solution and record yourself talking about the solution while showing on a Computer or Phone. Each video will be no longer than 8 minutes. However, most will be much shorter, (1-3 minutes). We offer $2 USD per video. And expected to create 3 videos per day. However we will start with only a few a week. There is lots of potential bonuses and pay rises available as freelancers get better with there editing skills, up to $5 USD per video.

This will mean a potential income of $465 USD per month.

If you believe you are a perfect candidate for this role, please reply with your favourite animal so we known you're read the job post. We will require a free sample of your work so we can move forward.

Requirements
-Fluent in English
-Camera
-Microphone
-Simple Editing Skills
-Simple Researching Skills
-Simple Script writing Skills

Examples from other Channels
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUJXjN_XRJ0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tAcOdqjWeMo

Budget: $465
Posted On: July 01, 2024 16:29 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video
Skills: Explainer Video
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Create a Faceless Youtube Channel for Sleep Sounds Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented freelancer to create a Faceless Youtube channel dedicated to 7-10 sleep sounds videos for monetization. The goal is to provide relaxing and high-quality content to help people sleep better. The videos should include a variety of soothing sounds such as rain, ocean waves, white noise, and gentle melodies. As the freelancer, you will be responsible for the entire process, from selecting the sounds, editing the videos, and creating engaging thumbnails. This project requires creativity, attention to detail, and knowledge of Youtube's monetization policies. If you have a passion for creating calming content and have experience in video editing, sound design, and Youtube channel management, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 16:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Virtual Background Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Virtual Background Designer to create branded virtual backgrounds for our video conference meetings. As a Virtual Background Designer, you will work closely with our team to understand our brand identity and create visually appealing backgrounds that align with our brand guidelines. Your responsibilities will include designing and building custom virtual backgrounds and incorporating our logo, colors, and other brand elements. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their design skills and experience in creating virtual backgrounds. Proficiency in graphic design software and a keen eye for detail are essential. Join our team and help us make a lasting impression in our video conferences!

I will need 3 different branding on each background

We are seeking a talented individual to create a captivating 3-5 second product mockup video for our skin care brand. This video will showcase the benefits and features of our products in an engaging and visually appealing way. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio of previous mockup videos.

    - Use visual effects and animations to bring our products to life
  
    Requirements:

    - Experience in creating product mockup videos
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work within tight deadlines

item.ns0:encoded:
We are seeking a talented individual to create a captivating 3-5 second product mockup video for our skin care brand. This video will showcase the benefits and features of our products in an engaging and visually appealing way. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio of previous mockup videos.
    Responsibilities:
    - Create a 3-5 second product mockup video that highlights the key features and benefits of our skin care products
    - Use visual effects and animations to bring our products to life
  
    Requirements:
    - Proficiency in video editing software and tools
    - Experience in creating product mockup videos
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work within tight deadlines

    If you are a creative individual who can bring our skin care products to life through compelling mockup videos, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work along with your application.

Budget: $15
Posted On: July 01, 2024 16:20 UTC
